subject: Steroids
Suits and Litigation
Perjury
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors appealed a judge’s decision that excluded several pieces of evidence in Barry Bonds’s perjury case, likely postponing his trial, which was scheduled to begin Monday.
snippet: Federal prosecutors appealed a judge’s decision that excluded several pieces of evidence in Barry Bonds’s perjury case, likely postponing his trial, which was scheduled to begin Monday.
